CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Show_Occurrence__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(Show_Occurrence_2__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(Show_Occurrence_3__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(Show_Occurrence_4__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(Show_Occurrence_5__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(Show_Occurrence_6__c),0,1)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of occurrences linked to this agreement (up to 6)
CustomField.label: Number of Show Occurrences
